"Souya": "Alright! I knew you'd be willing to help."
"I'm currently investigating the Red Containers out here in the Stia region."
"As you probably know, Red Containers have some of the rarest materials inside of them."
"What I'd like to investigate is how they've been distributed, and what they contain."
"Of course, I won't ask you to hand over any of the items or anything."
"Gather as much data as you can in each area of Stia."
